description:
Sora manages to win his game against Clami and Fi, and asks for their help in fighting the Eastern Federation.  Clami understands what he`s after and accepts his request, and promises to fight the Eastern Federation with him. Now that they`re allies, Sora invites them to partake of a Japanese tradition, the bath...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 指向法[ブルー・ローズ]
